page.title: 04Transport to work-Epping GR
page.content: A survey was conducded to see how people travelled to work.Of the people surveyed only 20% used the bus to travel to work,the majority used private cars.Only three of the people responded actually worked in Epping Green itself .More people worked in London (27.7%) than any other town or village.The next most popular place of work being Epping (14.5%);will Harlow Town accounting for approximately 7% of the work force. A feature of travel and employment was the relatively long distances people are prepared to go each day,among the places mentioned in the survey apart from those above were,Romford;Chelmsford;Hoddesdon; Enfield;TheydonBois and Waltham Abbey.The opportunities for employment in the immediate locality are few.
